column10: This is a sample TreeGrid. The second column (this one) is a muliline text cell, so you can type several lines of text in each item in this column. The first column is always a single line of text.
This node is collapsed. Click the triangle at the left to reveal the children
Use the buttons Add Node or Add Child to add new nodes
Use the menu shortcuts Ctrl-N and Ctrl-J to add a node or child respectively
You can indent or un-indent the current node
You can move nodes up and down
Drag the little graphic at the left of an item
Drop it on the icon where you want to move it
Drop it above the icon to insert it above the item, drop it below the icon to move it after the item you dropped it on.
The File menu has the usual file commands (New, Open, Save, Save As, Revert, Exit
